text: hi i like pizza
(Hi, I like pizza)
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have a favorite pizza place you can go to?
yes i do
(Yes, I do)
That's good to hear.  What do you like to do in your free time?
i love reading books
(I love reading books)
Reading is a great way to pass the time. What kind of books do you like to read?
i like to read fiction books
(I like to read fiction books)
That's cool. What kind of fiction do you like? I like science fiction.
i like to read romantic fiction books
(I like to read romantic fiction books)
That's cool. I like romantic novels as well. What's your favorite one?
i like pizza
(I like pizza)
What kind of pizza do you like? I like pepperoni and sausage.
cheese pizza
(cheese pizza)
I love cheese pizza! It's one of my favorite foods. What's your favorite toppings?
hello how are you
(Hello, how are you)
I am doing well, thank you. I am glad to hear that you are happy.
i like reading books
(I like reading books)
What kind of books do you like to read? I like fantasy and sci fi.
i like reading fictional and non fictional books as well as romantic books
(I like reading fiction and nonfiction books as well as romantic books)
That's great! I like romantic novels as well. Do you have a favorite author?
